HomePage.title: Build Your SaaS in Hours, Not Months
HomePage.description: The ultimate Next.js boilerplate for indie hackers. Authentication, payments, i18n, and more ‚Äî all pre-configured.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to launch your SaaS

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Built with Next.js 16 for optimal performance

global.title: Global Ready
global.description: i18n support for English and Korean out of the box

secure.title: Secure by Default
secure.description: Supabase Auth with RLS for enterprise-grade security

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you

questions.q: What's included in the starter kit?
questions.a: Everything you need: Auth, Payments, Email, Blog, i18n, and more. Plus premium UI components from shadcn/ui.

questions.q: Can I use this for commercial projects?
questions.a: Yes! This is a boilerplate meant for building and launching real SaaS products.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept all major credit cards via LemonSqueezy.

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your SaaS?
cta.description: Join hundreds of indie hackers building the future.

one.title: Global Scale from Day One
one.description: Don't limit your market. Our boilerplate comes with built-in internationalization (i18n) support, allowing you to reach customers in their native language instantly. Default support for English and Korean.

two.title: Developer Experience First
two.description: We've carefully selected the best modern stack: Next.js 16 (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. No more configuration headaches‚Äîjust start coding your features.

three.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
three.description: Security isn't an afterthought. We implement Row Level Security (RLS) policies in Supabase, secure authentication flows, and safe API patterns to keep your and your users' data safe.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Start building today. Cancel anytime.

questions.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.
